Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- 2nd Justice Court
PW Charter Amend. Prop. No.  1 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Investigatory Auth.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 1
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to specify the investigatory authority of the Jefferson Parish Council, by amending subsections 4 and 10 of Section 2.01(A) of the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 1 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Charter Amend. Prop. No.  2 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Parish Pres.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 2
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to provide that the Parish President shall be a full-time official of Jefferson Parish who shall perform no personal, professional, consulting or other services for compensation, but who may receive outside income only from passive investments or portfolio income as defined by the Internal Revenue Service; and that neither the Parish President nor the Council shall be entitled to sick or annual leave benefits, by amending Sections 2.03(C) and 3.01(A) of the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 2 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Charter Amend. Prop. No.  3 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Official Journal
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 3
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to replace the reference to "Official Newspaper'' with "Official Journal"; to allow for electronic publication of the Official Journal if not prohibited by State law; to amend the "lay-over'' period required for adoption of ordinances; and to remove language that places dependence of adoption of an ordinance on a publication date, by amending subsections B and D of Section 2.07 of the Jefferson Parish Charter and by adding Section 6.09 to the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 3 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Charter Amend. Prop. No.  4 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Law Enforce. Dist.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 4
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to include the law enforcement district in those districts excluded from the purview of the Jefferson Parish Finance Director, by amending Section 4.02(A)(4) of the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 4 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Charter Amend. Prop. No.  5 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Civil Service Dept.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 5
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to rename the Personnel Department as the Civil Service Department; to clarify the authority of the Civil Service Department; to include within the unclassified service employees in the offices of the Parish President, the Council members and the Parish Attorney; to provide for a Civil Service Board of five members who shall serve staggered, limited terms of five years each; to provide for the method of appointment of said Civil Service Board members; and to exclude from the Parish's Civil Service members of the Fire Civil Service, members of Boards and Commissions who are not Parish employees, persons who are engaged by the Parish on a contractual basis, and persons employed by the Hospital Service Districts, JEDCO, the Inspector General, and the Ethics and Compliance Commission, by amending Section 4.01(B) and Section 4.03 of the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 5 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Charter Amend. Prop. No.  6 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Parish Atty. Office
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 6
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to provide that all employees in the service of the Parish Attorney's Office shall be unclassified; to remove the requirement that Assistant Parish Attorneys be electors of the Parish; and to specify that the Council shall have authority to hire outside counsel for Parish matters as well as for matters involving special districts, by amending Section 4.04 of the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 6 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Charter Amend. Prop. No.  7 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Planning Board
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 7
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to rename the Planning Advisory Board as the Planning Board; and to allow the Council to delegate policy-making and quasi-judicial authority to various boards, by amending subsections 1 and 2 of Section 4.05 of the Jefferson Parish Charter and Section 4.06 of the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 7 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Charter Amend. Prop. No.  8 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Inspector General
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 8
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to provide that any funds remaining in the budget of the Inspector General at the end of the fiscal year shall carry over to the next fiscal year, except for funds required to be forwarded to the Parish general fund; and to provide that any investigation within the purview of the Inspector General shall take precedence over any investigation of the same person or activity conducted by the Parish, by amending Section 4.09(D)(2) of the Jefferson Parish Charter and by adding Section 4.09(E) to the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 8 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Charter Amend. Prop. No.  9 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Ethics & Compliance Comm.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 9
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to correct the names of the universities that nominate members of the Ethics and Compliance Commission, by amending Section 4.10(B) of the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 9 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Charter Amend. Prop. No. 10 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Hosp. Dist.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 10
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to provide that JEDCO and the hospital districts shall retain their respective current organizations and structures; to specifically exclude these districts from the general provisions of the Charter relating to the organization and structure of other special districts; and to impose restrictions on the use of funds derived from the sale or lease of hospital district assets, by amending the section heading of Section 6.01 of the Jefferson Parish Charter and by adding Section 6.01(D) and Section 6.01(E) to the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 10 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Charter Amend. Prop. No. 11 -- Charter Amend. - PC - Committee Records
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 11
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Charter be amended to provide that the Council by ordinance shall establish a repository for all Charter Advisory Committee records, by amending Section 6.08 of the Jefferson Parish Charter to read as stated in Section 11 of Jefferson Parish Ordinance No. 24820, adopted on September 3, 2014?
